casebody.data:
John DE MASCO, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 17, 1926.) No. 326. Dana Wallace, of Long Island City, N. Y. (Joseph Lonardo, of Long Island City, N. Y., on the brief), for plaintiff in error. William A. De Groot, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (H. H. Kellogg, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for the United States.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
